quote: Wishes are possibilities. Dare to make a wish.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To wish was to hope, and to hope was to expect
author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility

quote: If I were to wish for anything, I should not wish for wealth and power, but for the passionate sense of the potential, for the eye which, ever young and ardent, sees the possible. Pleasure disappoints, possibility never. And what wine is so sparkling, what so fragrant, what so intoxicating, as possibility!
author: Søren Kierkegaard,  Either/Or: A Fragment of Life

quote: Don't wish me happiness - I don't expect to be happy it's gotten beyond that, somehow. Wish me courage and strength and a sense of humor - I will need them all.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Don't wish...DO! Don't try...BE! Don't think...KNOW! And above all: Bless a stranger with a small, yet powerful, random act of kindness. You feel me?
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: If you could have one wish, what would it be? We all have hopes and dreams that we do almost anything to make real. And if we get lucky, and our wish is granted, maybe that's what we call happiness.
author: I Am An Idiot Spammer

quote: Life changes us. To wish otherwise is pointless.
author: Nalini Singh,  Angels of Darkness

quote: I wish...I wish I were dead...”“And what use would that be to anyone?
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: The most important thing in life is to stop saying 'I wish' and start saying 'I will.' Consider nothing impossible, then treat possiblities as probabilities.
author: David Copperfield

quote: We can’t continuously be a society of well-wishers. We must take action to bring those wishes to fruition.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: You do not get what you wish for, unless it be known to the source of your desire.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Be careful what you wish for. You never know who will be listening.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Soul Music

quote: Remember that a wish held fervently turns into belief, and a belief held diligently becomes reality.
author: Jim Stovall,  The Lamp

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul.
author: Charles Dickens,  A Tale of Two Cities

quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
author: Aristotle

quote: Hope might grant you a wish in the nick of time, Cosmic Ordering grants them all the time.
author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering: You can be successful

quote: You’re wishin’ too much, baby. You gotta stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone oughtta be.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quote: I wished upon a star and the heavens sent me you
author: Sonya Watson,  The Tide Breaker

quote: If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: My wish is that you may be loved to the point of madness.
author: André Breton,  What is Surrealism?: Selected Writings

quote: I wish I had a boyfriend. I wish he lived in the wardrobe on a coat hanger. Whenever I wanted, I could get him out and he'd look at me the way boys do in films, as if I'm beautiful.
author: Jenny Downham,  Before I Die

quote: Be Careful What You Wish For More often than not,a dream come true is a nightmare-in-the-making.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: My life changed the day I moved beyond just wishing for things and I started earning them. That is the day I learned that we don't get what we wish for, we get what we work for.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: If there's a single lesson that life teaches us, it's that wishing doesn't make it so.
author: Lev Grossman,  The Magicians

quote: You can't just wish change; you have to live the change in order for it to become a reality.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: When we give up the chase, we give up our wishing.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: I imagine what would happen if everyone turned their regrets into wishes, went around shouting them.
author: Nina LaCour

quote: I hope for happiness for you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I wish the night would end,I wish the day'd begin,I wish it would rain or snow,or the wind would blow,or the grass would grow,I wish I had yesterday,I wish there were games to play...
author: V.C. Andrews,  Flowers in the Attic

quote: Whatever you dream of, there will be fulfillment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  Pearls of Wisdom: Great mind

quote: Hope opens the door of opportunity and shines the way to possibilities.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Because hope comes from in you, and wishes are just magic.
author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: Aristotle

quote: Do you wish me a good morning, or mean that it is a good morning whether I want it or not; or that you feel good this morning; or that it is a morning to be good on?
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Hobbit

quote: I wanted to hold happiness in reserve, like a bottle of champagne. I postponed it because I was afraid, because I overvalued it, and then I didn't want to use it up, because what do you wish for then?
author: Curtis Sittenfeld,  The Man of My Dreams

quote: I wish I had never been born,"she said. "What are we born for?""For infinite happiness,"said the Spirit. "You can step out into it at any moment...
author: C.S. Lewis,  The Great Divorce

quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Hope is the boat we ride to reach the shore of our desires.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My hopes are not always realized, but I always hope.
author: Ovid

quote: Don't put off happiness you can have today. Tomorrow is a hope, not a promise
author: Debra Anastasia

quote: You don't win races by wishing, you win them by running faster than everyone else does.
author: Philip Pullman,  Clockwork

quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: What are you wishing for?' Grace interrupted. 'To kiss you,' I said to her.
author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Linger

quote: I don't let nobody see me wishin' he was mine
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I wish to live to 150 years old, but the day I die, I wish it to be with a cigarette in one hand and a glass of whiskey in the other.
author: Ava Gardner

quote: If you want something done, you'll have to dream it yourself.
author: Corey Aaron Burkes

quote: A person will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body - the wishbone.
author: Robert Frost

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
